sentences.sContent: We cannot allow dogmatism to stand in the way of progress.
sentences.sCn: 我们不能让教条主义阻碍前进的步伐。

remMethod.val: dogma(教条) + t + ism(表主义) → 教条主义

words.tran: 教条主义者；独断家；独断论者
把…作为教条阐述；武断地提出

trans.tranCn: 教条主义， 武断 being dogmatic)
trans.tranOther: If you refer to an opinion as dogmatism, you are criticizing it for being strongly stated without considering all the relevant facts or other people's opinions
